name: QtSplash
short_description: A Qt-based library for a boot/shutdown splash screen which is simple, robust, and easily customizable. Written for Linux, but theoretically portable to any platform supported by Qt. Developed for, and currently used by, the Rebit, Inc. Recovery CD.
